poem:
**Call to the Sky**

Wings of passion  
slice through a bruised  
heaven, leaving trails  
of heated sorrow  
above forgotten lands.  

Dreams built high  
on jet streams falter,  
calling us earthward.  
The air grieves, whispers—  
ground yourself, let the clouds  
heal, until skies can cradle  
our gentle aspirations.
